countries.json.description: Country data with parameters and border references

borders.json.description: Border metadata for route generation only (data loaded from Firestore)
borders.json.note: Border details are always loaded from Firestore, not from static files

border-posts.json.description: Border post details without geographic data (for lookups)

border-posts.geojson.description: Border crossing posts as Point features
border-posts.geojson.sizeEstimate: Small - Point geometries with status data

iso3-lookup.json.description: ISO A3 code to country data lookup table
